archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0523
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a business I want to be able to do a bulk order of device only, SIM only, device & Sim purchases for my business so that I don’t have to do them one at a time

properties.value: Please clarify: how data should be loaded from xls or UI, how many items should be ordered in one bulk (100 or 100k), how devices/subscriptions/sims are dispatched to users and when? In Enterprise Portal a customer could request 5-10 (30?) items (for devices only this could be more (say 100) as this should be just a field with requested amount for the customer). More numbers (especially subscriptions) should be handled by a defined spreadsheets. Bulk usecases to be described in more detail.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
